languages.text: Неожиданно для всех его поддержал могучий Космический волк Торбальд. Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан примирил{mf||а} их с лидером Эксплораторов, он смирил гордыню и изъявил готовность поддержать слуг Омниссии в деле освобождения благородной машины.

traits.locale_text: Неожиданно для всех, его поддержал великий тан Торбальд. Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан убедил{mf||а} его ранее в ценности технологий техножрецов для всего Человечества, он был готов оказать поддержку в освобождении крейсера.

languages.text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.
languages.original_text: Неожиданно для всех его поддержал могучий Космический волк Торбальд. Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан примирил{mf||а} их с лидером Эксплораторов, он смирил гордыню и изъявил готовность поддержать слуг Омниссии в деле освобождения благородной машины.

traits.locale_text: It came as a surprise to all when Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

It came as a surprise to all when Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

languages.text: 就连太空野狼的首领索巴德也支持统御贤者的意见，这让所有人大吃一惊。在舰长大人的斡旋下，索巴德与开拓者舰队的领袖成功和解。索巴德也收敛了自己的傲慢，支持奥普蒂孔22号解救尊贵机器的重要事业。
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

traits.locale_text: 就连太空野狼的首领索巴德也支持统御贤者的意见，这让所有人大吃一惊。在舰长大人的斡旋下，索巴德与开拓者舰队的领袖成功和解。索巴德也收敛了自己的傲慢，支持奥普蒂孔22号解救尊贵机器的重要事业。

languages.text: Tout le monde a été très surpris de voir le Space Wolf Thorbald soutenir le magos dominus. Une fois réconcilié avec le leader des Explorators par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, Thorbald avait mis sa fierté de côté et approuvé la libération de la noble machine.
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

traits.locale_text: Tout le monde a été très surpris de voir le Space Wolf Thorbald soutenir le magos dominus. Une fois réconcilié avec le leader des Explorators par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, Thorbald avait mis sa fierté de côté et approuvé la libération de la noble machine.

languages.text: スペースウルフのトールバルドがマゴス・ドミヌスを支持したことには、誰もが驚いた。ロード・キャプテンが彼を探索艦隊のリーダーと和解させた後、トールバルドはプライドを捨てて高貴な機械を解放するという技術司祭の大義を支持すると言ったのだ。
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

traits.locale_text: スペースウルフのトールバルドがマゴス・ドミヌスを支持したことには、誰もが驚いた。ロード・キャプテンが彼を探索艦隊のリーダーと和解させた後、トールバルドはプライドを捨てて高貴な機械を解放するという技術司祭の大義を支持すると言ったのだ。

languages.text: El Lobo Espacial, Thorbald, sorprendió a todos al apoyar al Magos Dominus. Desde que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán había logrado reconciliarle con el líder de los exploradores, Thorbald había calmado su orgullo y abogó por la causa de los tecnosacerdotes de liberar la noble máquina.
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

traits.locale_text: El Lobo Espacial, Thorbald, sorprendió a todos al apoyar al Magos Dominus. Desde que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán había logrado reconciliarle con el líder de los exploradores, Thorbald había calmado su orgullo y abogó por la causa de los tecnosacerdotes de liberar la noble máquina.

languages.text: Alle waren überrascht, als der Space Wolf Thorbald den Magos Dominus unterstützte. Nachdem der Lord Captain ihn mit dem Anführer der Exploratoren versöhnt hatte, zähmte Thorbald seinen Stolz und sprach sich für den Plan der Techpriester aus, die edle Maschine zu befreien.
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.

traits.locale_text: Alle waren überrascht, als der Space Wolf Thorbald den Magos Dominus unterstützte. Nachdem der Lord Captain ihn mit dem Anführer der Exploratoren versöhnt hatte, zähmte Thorbald seinen Stolz und sprach sich für den Plan der Techpriester aus, die edle Maschine zu befreien.

languages.text: Uzay Kurdu Thorbald, Magos Dominus'a arka çıktığında hepimiz şaşırdık. Lord Kaptan'ın Keşiftörlerin lideriyle Thorbald'ın arasını yapması üzerine Uzay Kurdu, gururunu çiğneyerek soylu makinenin özgürleştirilmesi hususunda Tekno Rahiplerin lehine konuştu.
languages.original_text: It came as a surprise to all when the Space Wolf Thorbald supported the Magos Dominus. After the Lord Captain had reconciled him with the Explorator leader, Thorbald had tamed his pride and spoke in favour of the Tech-Priests' cause of liberating the noble machine.
